subject: Steroids
Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: Lance Armstrong dismissed the confessions of doping by two of his former teammates from the 1999 Tour de France, saying that the disclosures had nothing to do with him.
snippet: Lance Armstrong dismissed the confessions of doping by two of his former teammates from the 1999 Tour de France, saying that the disclosures had nothing to do with him.
